name: Gem Tower Defence
description:
Gem Tower Defence was an old WC3 map originally made by Bryan K. This is a modified isometric remake, build in Unity, based primarily on the flash game of the same name (For comparison: http://www.gemtowerdefense.com/).

Patch v0.1: Fixed some stat errors with the gems

Patch v0.11: Buffed the Copper line substantially, increased base damage of Yellow Ruby to avoid confusion
